title: Prince of Chaos
description: The film adaptations of the fantasy adventure series by legendary author Horatio King.
quote: Become the nightmare that haunts their dreams. Become the death-bringer of prophesy. Become the prince of chaos!
altHero: a red haired woman in the woods wearing a gem headpiece and a fur coat
alt1: two women wait on horseback in the woods near a stream
alt2: a brunette woman stands next to a white horse
alt3: the readhead woman speaks with a man
